title: BOTR OUTKAST Looking For Good Gold++ SUpport to Join our team!
body:
Bastard OF THE RIFT

we are a newly formed team who been playing with each other quite abit now and are in need of a good support for this weekend Tournament on the 6th of december. we pretty much practice everyday and night, part from fridays and saturdays unless there is a tournament on that day. at the moment our team is silver 4 and Rising. basicly all players are gold ++. i wont say too much yet but i will say this if you want to know more then feel free to ask.

Requirements:

Working mic and skype.
Age of 17++
no ragers
can keep cool even if we are losing
Gold++


If you are interested then please add me ign:posipi or leave a message down here and ill get back  too you thank you hope to find the lucky support soon ;D

replies.body: If it wasn't for the gold requirement i'd be able to do this, oh well :P
